name: Star Dogs
description:
The two dogs Belka and Strelka survived one day in space aboard Sputnik 5 on August 19 in 1960 before returning safe to earth. That made them the first higher order living organisms to survive in space.

In this game they go on a second fictitious mission to a remote planet  to collect cyber krystals (not to be confused with kyber crystals).

Due to poor radio transmission only two types of commands can be used - left and right. Press the left or right side of the screen.

Good luck! Oh yeah - I almost forgot to mention it - there might be alien lifeforms on the planet. Probably nothing to worry about...

Credits

Belka and Strelka grafitti from Kharkiv 2008

Sounds from Pixabay

The game engine Phaser

How to make a Mario-style Platformer with Phaser 3

https://gamedevacademy.org/how-to-make-a-mario-style-platformer-with-phaser-3/

And last but not least, the Kenney Platformer Art Pixel Redux

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/platformer-art-pixel-redux
